actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE inventory_main
JOIN inventory_screeny ON inventory_main.id_wiersz = inventory_screeny.id 
SET inventory_main.opiszrabatami = CONCAT("System: ",inventory_screeny.system,
" | Skrzynka: ",inventory_screeny.skrzynka," | Kolor: ",inventory_screeny.kolor,
" | Szerokość: ", inventory_screeny.szerokosc," | Wysokość: ",inventory_screeny.wysokosc,
" | Tkanina: ",inventory_screeny.tkanina," | Napęd: ",inventory_screeny.naped,
" | Cena bazowa: ",round((inventory_screeny.cena/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2)," ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}},
" | Doplata kolor: ",inventory_screeny.procentdoplatakolor,"%"," | Kwota doplaty: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatakolor/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Doplata tkanina: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatatkanina/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Doplata do wkladki: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatawkladka/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Cena rolety z doplatami: ",round((inventory_screeny.systemzdoplata/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Rabat system: ",inventory_screeny.rabatsystem,"%"," | System po rabacie: ",round((inventory_screeny.systemporabacie/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Cena napędu: ",round((inventory_screeny.price_motor/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2)," ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}},
" | Rabat napęd: ",inventory_screeny.rabatmotor,"%"," | Napęd po rabacie: ",round((inventory_screeny.priceall/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Cena rolety kompletnej: ",round((inventory_screeny.cenanetto/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}),

inventory_main.opisbezrabatow = CONCAT("System: ",inventory_screeny.system,
" | Skrzynka: ",inventory_screeny.skrzynka," | Kolor: ",inventory_screeny.kolor,
" | Szerokość: ", inventory_screeny.szerokosc," | Wysokość: ",inventory_screeny.wysokosc,
" | Tkanina: ",inventory_screeny.tkanina," | Napęd: ",inventory_screeny.naped,
" | Doplata kolor: ",inventory_screeny.procentdoplatakolor,"%"," | Kwota doplaty: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatakolor/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Doplata tkanina: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatatkanina/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Doplata do wkladki: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatawkladka/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Cena rolety z doplatami po rabacie: ",round((inventory_screeny.systemporabacie/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Cena napędu po rabacie: ",round((inventory_screeny.priceall/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2)," ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}},
" | Cena rolety kompletnej: ",round((inventory_screeny.cenanetto/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}),

inventory_main.opiszrabatami_de = CONCAT("System: ",inventory_screeny.system,
" | Kasten: ",inventory_screeny.skrzynka," | Farbe: ",inventory_screeny.kolor,
" | Breite: ", inventory_screeny.szerokosc," | Höhe: ",inventory_screeny.wysokosc,
" | Stoff: ",inventory_screeny.tkanina," | Motor: ",inventory_screeny.naped,
" | Grundpreis: ",round((inventory_screeny.cena/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2)," ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}},
" | Farbzuschlag: ",inventory_screeny.procentdoplatakolor,"%"," | Farbzuschlagsbetrag: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatakolor/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Stoffzuschlag: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatatkanina/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Einlagenzuschlag: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatawkladka/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Preis mit Zuschlägen: ",round((inventory_screeny.systemzdoplata/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Systemrabatt: ",inventory_screeny.rabatsystem,"%"," | System nach Rabatt: ",round((inventory_screeny.systemporabacie/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Motorpreis: ",round((inventory_screeny.price_motor/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2)," ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}},
" | Motorradrabatt: ",inventory_screeny.rabatmotor,"%"," | Motor nach einem Rabatt: ",round((inventory_screeny.priceall/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Preis des Sets: ",round((inventory_screeny.cenanetto/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}),

inventory_main.opisbezrabatow_de = CONCAT("System: ",inventory_screeny.system,
" | Kasten: ",inventory_screeny.skrzynka," | Farbe: ",inventory_screeny.kolor,
" | Breite: ", inventory_screeny.szerokosc," | Höhe: ",inventory_screeny.wysokosc,
" | Stoff: ",inventory_screeny.tkanina," | Motor: ",inventory_screeny.naped,
" | Farbzuschlag: ",inventory_screeny.procentdoplatakolor,"%"," | Farbzuschlagsbetrag: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatakolor/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Stoffzuschlag: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatatkanina/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Einlagenzuschlag: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatawkladka/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Preis mit Zuschlägen nach Rabatt: ",round((inventory_screeny.systemporabacie/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Motorpreis nach Rabatt: ",round((inventory_screeny.priceall/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2)," ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}},
" | Preis des Sets: ",round((inventory_screeny.cenanetto/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}),



inventory_main.opiszrabatami_en = CONCAT("System: ",inventory_screeny.system,
" | Box: ",inventory_screeny.skrzynka," | Color: ",inventory_screeny.kolor,
" | Width: ", inventory_screeny.szerokosc," | Height: ",inventory_screeny.wysokosc,
" | Fabric: ",inventory_screeny.tkanina," | Motor: ",inventory_screeny.naped,
" | System base price: ",round((inventory_screeny.cena/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2)," ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}},
" | Color surcharge: ",inventory_screeny.procentdoplatakolor,"%"," | Color surcharge amount: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatakolor/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Fabric surcharge: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatatkanina/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Guide insert extra charge: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatawkladka/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Price system with additional charges: ",round((inventory_screeny.systemzdoplata/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Discount on the system: ",inventory_screeny.rabatsystem,"%"," | System after discount: ",round((inventory_screeny.systemporabacie/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Motor price: ",round((inventory_screeny.price_motor/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2)," ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}},
" | Discount on the motor: ",inventory_screeny.rabatmotor,"%"," | Motor after discount: ",round((inventory_screeny.priceall/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Price of the set (system+motor: ",round((inventory_screeny.cenanetto/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}),

inventory_main.opisbezrabatow_en = CONCAT("System: ",inventory_screeny.system,
" | Box: ",inventory_screeny.skrzynka," | Color: ",inventory_screeny.kolor,
" | Width: ", inventory_screeny.szerokosc," | Height: ",inventory_screeny.wysokosc,
" | Fabric: ",inventory_screeny.tkanina," | Motor: ",inventory_screeny.naped,
" | Color surcharge: ",inventory_screeny.procentdoplatakolor,"%"," | Color surcharge amount: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatakolor/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Fabric surcharge: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatatkanina/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Guide insert extra charge: ",round((inventory_screeny.doplatawkladka/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Price system with additional charges after discount: ",round((inventory_screeny.systemporabacie/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}}," | Motor price after discount: ",round((inventory_screeny.priceall/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2)," ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}},
" | Price of the set (system+motor: ",round((inventory_screeny.cenanetto/{{kursinput.text}})*{{narzutpdf.text}},2),
" ",{{Select6.selectedOptionLabel}})


;
